Text: How long will we see your take on x files series? I'm really eager for it and thank you for the invested efforts in the science fiction shows you did. Awesome job, man.
It shouldn't be much longer until I start posting the X-Files rips.  I'm up to season 5 in encoding.  I just need to add the subtitles to the first 4 seasons, then I will probably start to post them.
when will you post up season 9?
been a while that you uploaded something, so how long will you plan to upload the x files series?
